name: Venus & Augustus
description:
Sir Lastor is confidant and friend to Prince Augustus of Rome.

He's also has a secret of being madly in love with him.

Too bad the Prince is already engaged to marry The Lady of the Lands.

A short demo where custom and culture might overcome love.  For the TyranoBuilder Game Jam 2018. My first game ever!

All script, art and music: Gaming by Krylancelo
